TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardEventArgs ^ e);
type KeyboardEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyboardEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。
Docs.summary: 表示将处理键盘相关路由事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中没有现有的键盘事件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 使用 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> 委托。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> 使用 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> 基类作为其事件数据类。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> 用作更具体的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> 事件数据类的基类。 这些事件数据类由 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> 委托使用，而这些委托由现有 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 事件（例如和）使用 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。
